item.title: CVE-2024-24932|2024-02-12T05:44:34.932Z -- djo -- vk%20poster%20group
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Djo VK Poster Group allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects VK Poster Group: from n/a through 2.0.3.
